item.title: Coding dojo: Goldbach Conjecture
item.description: At the Barcelona Software Craftsmanship meetup, today I’ve facilitated a coding dojo on the Goldbach Conjecture. The problem was prepared by Manuel Rivero. The meetup event is here and there are plenty of solutions prepared by the pairs: Java C# Haskell PHP Java PHP Haskell
